entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this morning and early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023
